ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides tools, helpers and data structures for developing models and time series functions for 'fable' and extension packages. These tools support a consistent and tidy interface for time series modelling and analysis.

Provides tools, helpers and data structures for developing models and time series functions for 'fable' and extension packages. These tools support a consistent and tidy interface for time series modelling and analysis.

name: r-fabletools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-fabletools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/fabletools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/fabletools/fabletools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6f740e52afad185809ad8179524cddfeab972c366a06fd7983a1d92a8e6bcb98

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-distributional >=0.3.0.9000
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-generics
    - r-ggdist
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.0.0
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-progressr
    - r-rlang >=0.4.5
    - r-scales
    - r-tibble >=1.4.1
    - r-tidyr >=1.1.0
    - r-tidyselect
    - r-tsibble >=0.9.0
    - r-vctrs >=0.2.2
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6
    - r-distributional >=0.3.0.9000
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-generics
    - r-ggdist
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.0.0
    - r-lifecycle
    - r-progressr
    - r-rlang >=0.4.5
    - r-scales
    - r-tibble >=1.4.1
    - r-tidyr >=1.1.0
    - r-tidyselect
    - r-tsibble >=0.9.0
    - r-vctrs >=0.2.2

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('fabletools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('fabletools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://fabletools.tidyverts.org/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Provides tools, helpers and data structures for developing models and time series functions for 'fable' and extension packages. These tools support a consistent and tidy interface for time series modelling and analysis.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: fabletools
# Version: 0.1.0
# Title: Core Tools for Packages in the 'fable' Framework
# Description: Provides tools, helpers and data structures for developing models and time series functions for 'fable' and extension packages. These tools support a consistent and tidy interface for time series modelling and analysis.
# Authors@R:  c(person(given = "Mitchell", family = "O'Hara-Wild", email = "mail@mitchelloharawild.com", role = c("aut", "cre")), person(given = "Rob", family = "Hyndman", role = "aut"), person(given = "Earo", family = "Wang", role = "aut"), person(given = "Di", family = "Cook", role = "ctb"))
# Depends: R (>= 3.1.3)
# Imports: tsibble (>= 0.8.0), ggplot2 (>= 3.0.0), tidyselect, rlang (>= 0.2.0), stats, dplyr (>= 0.8.0), tidyr (>= 0.8.3), generics, R6, utils
# Suggests: colorspace, covr, crayon, digest, fable, furrr, knitr, methods, tibble (>= 1.4.1), pillar (>= 1.0.1), feasts, rmarkdown, scales, spelling, testthat, tsibbledata, lubridate, SparseM
# Additional_repositories: https://tidyverts.org/
# ByteCompile: true
# License: GPL-3
# URL: http://fabletools.tidyverts.org/
# BugReports: https://github.com/tidyverts/fabletools/issues
# Encoding: UTF-8
# LazyData: true
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# Language: en-GB
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-08-08 12:20:24 UTC; mitchell
# Author: Mitchell O'Hara-Wild [aut, cre], Rob Hyndman [aut], Earo Wang [aut], Di Cook [ctb]
# Maintainer: Mitchell O'Hara-Wild <mail@mitchelloharawild.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-08-08 14:30:02 UTC
